subject: Sales
title: Gap Selling
description: A quick, practical guide to Gap Selling.

hook.text: Gap Selling asks: what's the distance between your current state and where you need to be?

buildup.text: The gap is the space between the buyer's current problem state and their desired future outcome.

discovery.text: A bigger gap means greater urgency. Sellers who quantify the gap create undeniable motivation to buy.

twist.text: If the gap is small, the deal won't close. No pain means no urgency, no matter how good the product.

climax.text: Probe deeply to widen the gap. Show the full cost of inaction. Make the current state intolerable.

punchline.text: No gap, no deal. Make the gap undeniable.

quiz.question: What is the 'gap' in Gap Selling?
options: The distance between current state and desired outcome
The time between first contact and closing
